At-Will âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Reach 2

+22 vs AC; 1d10+7 damage plus 1d6 fire damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+22 vs AC; 1d8+7 damage.

At-Will

Standard

Andraemos makes two claw attacks or one bite attack, and then shifts 1 square.

Immediate Reaction

Targets the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy enters or leaves an adjacent square,

+20 vs Fortitude; 1d10+7 damage, the target is knocked prone, and Andraemos shifts 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Close blast 5

+20 vs Reflex; 3d8+7 fire damage, and the target is knocked prone. Miss: Half damage.

Encounter âœ¦ Fire

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and Andraemos uses it. If he is flying, he can shift 5 squares before making this attack

At-Will âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Ranged 10

+20 vs Reflex; 3d6+6 fire damage, and any creature adjacent to the target takes 2d10 fire damage.

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +20 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
Andraemos's attacks deal 1d6 extra damage to any target marked by one of his allies.
